content: Welcome to Forest. By using our services, you agree to these terms and conditions.
You must provide accurate information when creating an account with Forest.
Users are responsible for maintaining the confidentiality of their account information.
Forest services are for personal and non-commercial use only, unless otherwise specified.
All content and materials on Forest are protected by copyright and other intellectual property laws.
Your use of Forest is also governed by our Privacy Policy, which can be found on our website.
Users may not engage in any illegal or unauthorized use of Forest services.
Users must not post or share content that is offensive, harmful, or violates others' rights.
Forest reserves the right to modify or discontinue any part of its services at any time.
Forest may terminate or suspend your account for violations of these terms.
Forest services are provided "as is" without any warranties, express or implied.
Forest shall not be liable for any indirect, incidental, or consequential damages.
Users agree to indemnify Forest against any claims arising from their use of the services.
These terms are governed by the laws of the jurisdiction where Forest is headquartered.
Any disputes shall be resolved through arbitration in accordance with applicable laws.
Forest may update these terms from time to time, and users are responsible for reviewing them.
These terms constitute the entire agreement between users and Forest regarding the use of services.
For any questions about these terms, please contact us at lungisani@forestheory.com.
By submitting content to Forest, you grant us a non-exclusive license to use, modify, and display it.
Forest is not responsible for any third-party websites linked to or from our services.
Users must be at least 13 years old to use Forest services.
If applicable, users agree to pay all fees associated with premium services offered by Forest.
Refunds, if any, are provided in accordance with our refund policy available on our website.
Forest may collect and use data as described in our Privacy Policy to improve our services.
While we strive for 24/7 availability, we do not guarantee uninterrupted access to our services.
Any feedback or suggestions provided to Forest may be used without any obligation to compensate the user.
Users must comply with all applicable export control laws when using Forest services.
Forest is not liable for any failure to perform due to circumstances beyond our reasonable control.
If any provision of these terms is found to be unenforceable, the remaining provisions will continue in effect.
Failure to enforce any right or provision of these terms will not be considered a waiver of those rights.
Users may not assign or transfer their account or rights under these terms without Forest's consent.
Forest may provide notifications via email or through our services.
These terms are written in English, and any translations are provided for convenience only.
Provisions that by their nature should survive termination shall survive termination of these terms.
Section headings in these terms are for convenience only and have no legal or contractual effect.
